name: Growing Balls
description:
Brainly, arcade game with innovative gameplay. Try to bet the best score! Growing balls based on Hundreds flash game idea.

How to play:
Tap on a ball to a growing the ball. You win when the sum of grow balls is equal 100. Do not grow balls when they touch each other.

Features:
- great physics
- addictive and great gameplay
- online leaderboards (powered by GameCenter)
- user friendly interface
- easy to play, hard to master

This game requires reflex and resistance to stres but is good for everyone!
